meta.name: description
meta.content: Our students have achieved high levels of success in academics, the visual and performing arts, and athletics, due to their own efforts and talents and thanks to the outstanding skill and dedication of our educators.
Welcome to Shrewsbury Public Schools in Shrewsbury, MA

Our students have achieved high levels of success in academics, the visual and performing arts, and athletics, due to their own efforts and talents and thanks to the outstanding skill and dedication of our educators.

a.span: All Shrewsbury Public Schools will be closed through the end of the 2019-2020 academic year

h5.a: School Closure Extended for Remainder of Year

p.span:
OUR MISSION
The Shrewsbury Public Schools, in partnership with the community, will provide students with the skills and knowledge for the 21st century, an appreciation of our democratic tradition and the desire to continue to learn throughout life.
